content: the perfect palate cleanser project just one skein of yarn and a free night or two and you have a perfectly sized perfectly fluffy accessory we re sure you ll make more than one *errata note* the gauge stated should be 15 sts over 4 in stockinette stitch rather than the 12 sts stated on the pattern gauge is not critical for this project but in our big birdie yarn you are aiming for a squishy and closely knit fabric sample shown big birdie in color atomic sizes one size finished measurements approx 52 wingspan x 14 deep yarn requirements *please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make * dimond laine big birdie 79% alpaca 21% silk 174 yards per 100g 1 skein or aran weight yarn in the following amounts 174 yds/ 160 m suggested needles *needles listed are suggested * gauge needle us 8 5 0mm 24 circular needles or longer tools darning needle gauge *while gauge is not crucial it will affect overall yardage used and the overall finished dimensions * 15 sts and 22 row=4 in stockinette st using gauge needle blocked **errata** the gauge is incorrectly printed on the pattern your gauge should be closer to 15 sts = 4 in stockinette stitch as stated above
